title: Rosa Maria
subTitle: Rosa Maria is a newly emerging star who gained popularity through her makeup tutorials on TikTok. In her videos, she teaches her audience new makeup styles and shares tips on how to run a makeup boutique. Invest now so she can start expanding her boutique chain.

title: Jimmy Doe
subTitle: Jimmy Doe is a CEO and entrepreneur who started a startup in artificial intelligence that helps people with visual impairments using specially designed headsets. Invest in him now so he can expand his business.
